name: White_Sector
description:
A old tractor ship with you in its cockpit trying to stay alive in this colorful orbit.

You are trying to survive in this white_sector in the orbit with a jalopy ship like yours and missiles closing in on you, you have to balance between being to slow and not being to fast to overheat. 

Also your fuel is depleting, your bullets are almost empty and your hull is really not flawless, so you have to shoot at the parts of a space station you think hold the sweet nectar you need (oil, scrap & ammo).

                                           

Controls:

Here you can see the controls of this game
